message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $11,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but the value of this product is truly above that. How about we meet in the middle at $11,100?
I understand your perspective on the product's value, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $11,000. How about we try $10,900?
